name: VimJam: Round Trip Dungeon
description:
This is made for VimJam Game Jam. (https://itch.io/jam/vimjam)

Theme: There and Back

Focus: Collectables

You adventure through the dungeon as a noble wizard, who needs to collect ancient runes to progress. Hidden rooms and enemy filled paths will try to stop our wizard, will you be able to lead him to victory.

Sound Credits:

http://dight310.byu.edu/media/audio/FreeLoops.com/5/5/

https://opengameart.org/users/youre-perfect-studio(Spooky Dungeon)
